questions_and_notes: Are the long name, description, comment and standard name correct?   This has same standard name as emidust-AERmon.  How exactly do they differ? Root name should probably be improved.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 0 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
comment: Emission from a primary source located anywhere within the atmosphere, including at the lower boundary (i.e. the surface of the earth).
